item.title: Epidemiology of metastatic breast cancer
item.description: [!info] ğŸŒ± ä¾†è‡ª: [[metastatic breast cancer]] Epidemiology of metastatic breast cancer 6% of breast CA is met at dx (SEER Cancer Stats Review 1975â€“2013) HR+/HER2- ~60%, HR-/HER2+ ~10%, HR+/HER2+ ~15%, TNBC ~15% Risk of BC recurrence after local Rx greatest in 1st 3 yrs but persists for decades, w/HER2+/TNBC pts at highest risk for early recurrence & ER+ for late (JCO 2016;34:927) Most common met sites: Lung (esp TNBC), bone (esp ER+), liver, & adrenal gland
